Understate: The claim may understate the fact that the image of the orb was not from a 2002 episode of The Simpsons, but rather from a promotional video released in 2017.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that The Simpsons predicted the Trump orb moment, but there is no evidence to support this assumption.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that The Simpsons predicted the Trump orb moment. The expert's verdict mentions that fact-checking website Snopes debunked this claim.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert's verdict provides an alternative explanation for the image of the orb, stating that it was a decorative globe at the inauguration of the Global Center for Combating Extremist Ideology in Riyadh.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image was not from a 2002 episode of The Simpsons, but from a promotional video released in 2017.
